name: M-Rayquaza vs Doexys Pokemon Showdown Skin
description: This is a skin based off Mega Rayquaza and Deoxys. If you see any issue, anything that doesn't look right then PM me on the Wisp server, I'm usually under the name Master Float. And if you enjoy this skin don't hesitate to drop a positive comment/thumbs up. This skin effects play.pokemonshowdown.com and psim.us servers.
additional_info:
17th of June: fixed the highlights.

Update on the 28th of June: updated the menugroup buttons!
Update on the 29th of June: added gradients for chrome!
Update on the 15th of December: fix battles and background!
